name: Wars - A top-down shooter game
description:
★ Wars - A top-down scrolling shooter game★ 

Welcome to Wars! A cool, top-down scrolling shooter survival-type game. This is a game where you will need to kill zombies and defeat bosses. 

The game has A LOT of things that you will discover while playing.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

★ Also, there are controls and SPECIFIC instructions in the game itself. But if you are too lazy to go to the instructions or controls in the game, then here it is though not as good and specific as it is in-game.

★ W,  A, S, D, or arrow keys - Movement

★ Space bar or left mouse click - Shooting

★ Mouse crosshair - Aim

★ 1 - 9 - Switch between guns

★ "P" - open IN-GAME shop

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

★ Content

★ The game includes:

30+ Weapon/Guns

10+ Types of zombies

5+ Different Bosses

3 Maps

6 Gun packs

4 Modes

5 Difficulties

Competitive

★ And surprisingly, Much More!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
